title: DevSynth Project Manifest Schema
description: Defines the essential project structure for DevSynth ingestion.

projectName.description: The unique name of the project.

version.description: The version of the manifest file itself.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp of the last update to the manifest.

type.description: The overall type of the project structure.

primaryLanguage.description: Primary programming language used in the project.

source.description: Paths to source code directories, relative to project root.

tests.description: Paths to test directories, relative to project root.

docs.description: Paths to documentation directories, relative to project root.

packagesRoot.description: Root directory for packages in a monorepo.

entryPoints.description: Main entry points for the application.

ignore.description: Glob patterns for files to ignore.

include.description: Glob patterns for files to explicitly include.

keyArtifacts.description: Optional list of important artifacts to highlight

path.description: Path to the document from the project root.

purpose.description: Brief description of the document's purpose.

resources.description: Configuration for global and project-level resources

global.description: Global resources that DevSynth needs to interact with

configDir.description: Path to the global configuration directory.

cacheDir.description: Path to the global cache directory.

logsDir.description: Path to the global logs directory.

memoryDir.description: Path to the global memory directory.

project.description: Project-level resources that DevSynth needs to interact with

configDir.description: Path to the project configuration directory.

cacheDir.description: Path to the project cache directory.

logsDir.description: Path to the project logs directory.

memoryDir.description: Path to the project memory directory.
